comment: Horrible professor. Had a lot going on this semester personally, and she is not understanding. A couple of times I forgot to sign the attendance sheet and she knew I was there but counted me absent!!! Attendance is graded!! Told me she couldnt understand why I didnt understand directions when she understood them clearly. Plays favorites.

Super nice professor, amazingly understanding when I couldn't do assignments due to mental health issues, and she let me make them up! 4 quizzes, 2 roleplays (5 minutes and 10 minutes) and community interview + papers on each, midterm paper & final paper. She helped pointing out what I did right when I thought I bombed the roleplays or interviews.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Gave a lot of assignments, makes you feel as though she is very open and willing to help which she sorta of does. However, anytime i went to her for help i just felt even more confused and incompetent.  She does give the same assignment multiple times and says she will provide feedback but her feedback is not very helpful.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She has been the best teacher I have ever had. Always made me feel as though I was doing a good job and provided feedback. She is easy to talk to, and she will work with you to make sure you get the best outcome fro taking this class.

I absolutely loved this class! Professor Slater was an awesome teacher and provided incredible insight and direction for future Helpers. She was patient, thoughtful, respectful, and by far my favorite teacher for the semester. Thank goodness too since I had her from 11-1:45pm. No idea why she has such low ratings. My class loved her!

Good teacher. Needs to be clearer on assignments and she is very slow to grade everything. She doesn't listen well when you are talking. Take another teacher if possible. must read the book for exams.

If you could take another professor, DO IT! in  a hear beat!!! She doesn't understand simple concepts, her assignments are useless busy work with ridiculous, hard to understand instructions. She told a student that she didn't understand why she couldn't understand her instructions, because SHE could understand them. Just avoid her at all cost!

If there is another option available, consider it. She is not the toughest teacher, but she definitely will push you in her classes. At times the students were lost, and she didn't seem very understanding when I was asking for help.

DO NOT TAKE ANY OF HER CLASSES! She is very unorganized and forgetful. She does not grade or return your assignments in a timely manner.  She gives a lot of unnecessary busy work, which you learn nothing from. She is not clear with her assignment instructions. She takes it VERY personal if you do not attend and participate in all of her classes.

A very limited professor. If you have the chance to take another instructor I would advise you too especially if you like instuctors that are open-minded. She lacks cultural competance,the irony of being the head of the department,SMH.

Avoid this instructor for foundation/advanced internship.  Several useless assignments and busy work (8 steps to change, 6 process recordings) However very supportive of the students regarding internship issues.  The course was rather limited.

I would not recommend anyone take this class. She rambles too much about nothing, has alot of stories from her career as a MSW, BUT! .. she is not organized, she does not return grades in a timely manner,I feel she is careless& she never responds to emails. Attendance is Mandatory! Easy class but very fustrating. Make sure you make copies of things

She is okay as a teacher.  The problem is she is not very clear on what she is teaching seems to ramble a lot.  she does not teach everything in the book but, you need to know it for her mid-term and final.  She talks a lot about herself and seems passionate about her field of work.  If you have to take her do so but if you can get someone else.

Try to take another prof. if you can she treats you like your in the first grade. She takes attendance at the beginning and at the end of class. Does not allow make-ups works and talk too much about herself.
she is a great professor but tend to talk a little bit too much. very helpful, I recommend her class.
